{{infobox character | people=[[Noldor|Noldo]] | name=Aranwë | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location= | affiliation= | language= | birth= | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=Fingolfin | parentage= | siblings= | spouse=[[Falathrim]] lady related to [[Círdan]]{{UT|Tuor}} | children=[[Voronwë]] | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Aranwë''' ([[Quenya|Q]], pron. {{IPA|[aˈranwe]}} was an [[Noldor|Elf]] of the [[House of Fingolfin]]. It is possible that he was a nobleman of [[Gondolin]], because of the meaning of his name and because his son [[Voronwë]] came from Gondolin.{{UT|Tuor}} ==Etymology== ''Aranwë'' is a [[Quenya]] name. Its meaning is not glossed, but Paul Strack suggests it means "King-person" and is a compound of ''[[aran]]'' ("king") and the (mainly masculine) name-suffix ''[[-wë]]'' ("man", "person").{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-1776237503.html|articlename=Q.
